content:
“You’re not ready to give up, are you?” says Kal from a short distance ahead. “I’ve barely worked up a sweat!”

Rangers Choose

A) Not on your life, Kal Iver! Discard all   and 1 edge from Kal. Each Ranger soothes 1 fatigue. Travel to one of the Artery locations before Kal gains the edge over you.

B) I suppose I am. Each Ranger soothes 1 fatigue. Discard Kal Iver.
